Jason Terry

Jason Eugene Terry

(J.T., The Jet)

Position: Shooting Guard and Point Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-2, 185lb (188cm, 83kg)

Born: September 15, 1977 in Seattle, Washington us

Relatives: Cousin Martell Webster

College: Arizona

High School: Franklin in Seattle, Washington

Draft: Atlanta Hawks, 1st round (10th pick, 10th overall), 1999 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 2, 1999

Career Length: 19 years

  • 2011 NBA Champ
  • 1999-00 All-Rookie
  • 2008-09 Sixth Man

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Jason Terry?

Jason Terry is 47 years old.

Where was Jason Terry born?

Jason Terry was born in Seattle, Washington.

When was Jason Terry born?

Jason Terry was born on September 15, 1977.

How tall is Jason Terry?

Jason Terry is 6-2 (188 cm) tall.

How much did Jason Terry weigh when playing?

Jason Terry weighed 185 lbs (83 kg) when playing.

Is Jason Terry in the Hall of Fame?

Jason Terry is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Jason Terry drafted?

Jason Terry was drafted by Atlanta Hawks, 1st round (10th pick, 10th overall), 1999 NBA Draft.

What position did Jason Terry play?

Shooting Guard and Point Guard.

When did Jason Terry retire?

Jason Terry last played in 2018.

What is Jason Terry's net worth?

Jason Terry made at least $108,253,648 playing professional basketball.

How much did Jason Terry make?

Jason Terry made $11,158,000 in 2012.

What did Jason Terry average?

Jason Terry averaged 13.4 points, 2.3 rebounds, and 3.8 assists per game.

How many rings does Jason Terry have?

Jason Terry won one championship.

What is Jason Terry's Twitter account?

Jason Terry is on Twitter at jasonterry31.

What schools did Jason Terry attend?

Jason Terry attended Franklin in Seattle, Washington and Arizona.

What are Jason Terry's nicknames?

J.T., The Jet are nicknames for Jason Terry.
